cookingTips: Pat chicken dry before dipping in dressing so bread crumbs adhere better
Let breaded chicken rest on a plate for 15 minutes before cooking for the coating to set
Cook over medium-high heat until golden brown; don't let the coating burn before chicken cooks through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to get the bread crumbs to stick to the chicken? Should I refrigerate it after breading?
